mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DOC_LINE(DOC_NO, DOC_SEQ, USER_ID) VALUES(#{doc_no},#{seq},#{apvr_id})
mapper.select: select a.doc_no , a.doc_user_id , a.doc_ttl , b.user_dept , a.crt_date , a.doc_ctgr1 , a.doc_ctgr2 from DOC_BASE a left join USER_BASE b on a.doc_user_id = b.user_id where doc_user_id = #{user_id}

select a.doc_no , a.doc_ttl , a.doc_text , a.doc_user_id , a.crt_date , b.user_dept , a.doc_ctgr1 , a.doc_ctgr2 from DOC_BASE a left join USER_BASE b on a.doc_user_id = b.user_id where doc_no = #{doc_no};
SELECT DOC_SEQ as seq , USER_ID as apvr_id FROM DOC_LINE WHERE DOC_NO = #{doc_no}

SELECT DOC_CTGR1 AS DOC_CTGR FROM DOC_BASE WHERE DOC_USER_ID = #{user_id} AND DOC_CTGR1 IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT DOC_CTGR2 AS DOC_CTGR FROM DOC_BASE WHERE DOC_USER_ID = #{user_id} AND DOC_CTGR2 IS NOT NULL
